    • Constructor Detail

      • NeuralNetworkChromosome

        public NeuralNetworkChromosome(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> representation,
                       java.lang.Double[] y)
        Default constructor to create a NeuralNetworkChromosome with the given representation of a Network.
        Parameters:
        representation[0] - the unique ID of this Network.
        representation[1] - the statistical distribution drawn from to determine neurons' initial values and firing thresholds.
        representation[2] - the number of input neurons.
        representation[3] - the number of neurons in each hidden layer.
        representation[4] - the number of synapses.
        representation[5] - the the number of layers.
        representation[6] - the the learning rate used for reinforcement in backpropagation.
        representation[7] - the scaling (or dampening) factor used to modulate the learning rate as backpropagation takes place.
        y - the correct/ideal/target values that are used to train the network.
